group_1.narration: I'm Kaoru Maki.@Along with Kazumi and Umika, we're@Magical Girls from Asunaro City.
We were fighting with a Witch like usual...@But while we were chasing it, we somehow@ended up in Kamihama City.
If that wasn't enough, the Witch caught@us off guard with a powerful attack!@Before I knew it, we got split up...

group_1.textCenter: (Where'd I end up now? I'm way out of my@depth here...)
(I can't reach them through my Soul Gem,@either...)
(Eh, I'm sure Umika's fine. The real problem@is Kazumi...)

group_1.narration: Umika said it hasn't been that long since@she woke up, so she could be unstable.
There might be all kinds of side effects@from fighting too hard in a strange place...
Kazumi's a girl with a lot of secrets,@but that's a story for another day.
I better get it into gear and look for them.

group_1.textCenter: This means there's a Witch or Familiar@nearby...
Could it be the one we were fighting? Or is@it another Witch from this town?
Not that it makes any difference...
Fighting Witches and protecting the world@is what us Magical Girls were made for!
All right! Time for the kick-off!
